Name: Tabula Rasa
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A chocolate Negroni-style drink. Bitter chocolate laced with alcohol.
History: Created in 2009 by Klaus St Rainer at Schumann's Bar, Munich, Germany.
